Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires a uniform processes for considering applications to purchase condominiums or cooperatives
Summary: Requires a uniform process for considering applications to purchase condominiums or cooperatives.
LawCode: Add ยง519-b, N-PC L; add ยง728, BC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law and the business corporation law, in relation to cooperative purchase applications
